command.dmForbidden: I can't execute that command inside DMs!
command.waitCooldown: please wait {{time}} more second(s) before reusing the `{{name}}` command.
command.error: There was an error trying to execute that command !

config.shortDescription: Configure the default language for the games in the current channel.
config.title: Configuration
config.instructions: {{author}} you can select which language I will use in this channel. The language availables are: {{locales}}
config.noResponse:
It seems that you forgot to add a reaction {{author}} !
 The config stays the same.
config.success: The configuration for this channel has been updated.

help.shortDescription: Liste toutes mes commandes ou bien une commande spécifique
help.description:
Le cadavre exquis est in jeu qui consiste à écrire une petite histoire à plusieurs, mais sans savoir ce que tes amis ont écrit!
Pour lancer une partie, il suffit d'envoyer `{{startCmd}}`
help.listCmds: Here's a list of all my commands:
help.detailledHelp: You can send `{{prefix}}help [command name]` to get info on a specific command!

start.shortDescription: Create a game. By default the game plays in {{defaultRound}} rounds.
start.title: Let's play
start.joinInstruction:
Join the game by reacting {{joinEmoji}}
{{creator}} you can launch the game by reacting {{startEmoji}}
start.notEnoughPlayers: You can't play alone, go get some friends first.
start.rejectCreation: You already have an active game {{creator}}
start.explainWhoGotRejected: If you are not in, that mean you are currently in an active game
start.notifyWhoFirst: you go first, check your DMs

stop.onlyCreator: Only {{creator}} is powerful enough to stop the game.

Play-tip: Your phrase will be sent to the next participant with only the last {{visibleWords}} words visible.
Created: You are sleeping, we skipped your turn !
Skip: You are sleeping, we skipped your turn !
DM error: Couldn't send a DM to {{user}}, we skip your turn.
Hint: Here is how {{author}} ended his part: **{{hint}}**
Tip visible word:
`Pro tip: you can choose what to hide by putting the text this way:
||This story is hidden|| and this part is not`
Info last round: Final step, you will conclude this masterpiece !
Not enough words: Don't be so shy, write a least {{visibleWords}} words.
Next user will receive: Here is the hint {{nextUser}} will receive: {{hint}}
